definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
formal title of the Japanese prime minister
pinyin: Nei4 ge2 Zong3 li3 Da4 chen2

definition: Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
chancellor (rank in various European states)/grand chancellor
Minister of Navy during Qing times

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下參議員克林頓的一封信，今天陸軍大臣。

sentences.english: The old minister paid great attention to everything, that he might be able to repeat it to the Emperor on his return.
sentences.chinese: 老大臣非常關注細節，以保回去之後可以對皇帝重述。

sentences.english: But there was another layer, designed for the people in the ministries.
sentences.chinese: 但演說還有另一層面，是說給部長和大臣們聽的。

sentences.english: Some officials kept silent because they were afraid of being persecuted by Zhao Gao.
sentences.chinese: 有的大臣害怕遭到趙高的迫害，於是保持沉默。

sentences.english: I would like to express my condolences to Agricultural Minister Matsuoka's family and wife he has left behind.
sentences.chinese: 我想對農林水產大臣的家人和妻子表達我的哀悼之情。

sentences.english: In area under Kulun Amban's jurisdiction, the New Policy progressed much.
sentences.chinese: 庫倫辦事大臣轄區的新政進展較大。

sentences.english: He has been awarded for several times the MEXT prize of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經多次獲得日本文部科學大臣獎等諸多藝術獎項。

sentences.english: The minister incurred the king's disfavour.
sentences.chinese: 這位大臣招致國王的冷遇。

sentences.english: When the day arrived, the headman assembled all the villagers and led them into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 到了約定時日，大臣召集全部村民，帶入叢林。

sentences.english: The soldiers tied the hands of the defeated king and all of his ministers.
sentences.chinese: 士兵將這位戰敗國王和他所有大臣的手都綁了起來。

sentences.english: Chancellery is fraught, to fraud of kingly painful Chen Li, say to handle bad meeting a conquered nation.
sentences.chinese: 大臣心急如焚，向國王痛陳利弊，說弄不好會亡國。

sentences.english: Later, she often granted the pie to the ministers of the palace as a reward.
sentences.chinese: 以後，她就經常把茯苓餅賞給那些王公大臣。

sentences.english: In their decision last night, finance ministers tried to assuage the markets.
sentences.chinese: 在昨晚的決定中，財政大臣試圖緩和市場情況。

sentences.english: The president appoints all cabinet-level government administrators.
sentences.chinese: 總統任命所有的內閣國務大臣。

sentences.english: Environment Minister Tetsuo Saito has said achieving such a goal was possible.
sentences.chinese: 環境大臣齊藤哲夫認爲，達到這樣的目標是可能的。

sentences.english: The chancellor of the Exchequer groaned about our dwindling dollar resources.
sentences.chinese: 財政大臣爲我們日益減少的美元儲備而叫苦。

definition: member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
